requirements.summary: Create a product catalog that displays skincare items with product name, description, price, and product image
acceptanceCriteria: Products are displayed in a grid or list layout
Each product shows name, description, price, and image
Product data is stored and retrieved from the backend

file_operations.description: Create product catalog page that fetches products from backend using getProducts() method and displays them in a grid layout with name, description, price, and image for each product
Create reusable product card component that displays individual product information including image, name, description, price, and add-to-cart button

requirements.summary: Implement a shopping cart system where users can add skincare products, view cart contents, update quantities, and remove items
acceptanceCriteria: Users can add products to cart from the product catalog
Cart displays all added items with quantities and subtotals
Users can increase or decrease item quantities
Users can remove items from the cart
Cart shows total price for all items

file_operations.description: Create shopping cart page that displays cart items fetched via viewCart() backend method, shows quantities and subtotals, allows quantity updates via addToCart() with updated quantities, and displays total price
Create cart item component that displays product details, quantity controls for increasing/decreasing amounts, remove button, and line item subtotal
Create custom hook that manages cart state, provides functions to add items via addToCart() backend method, fetch cart contents via viewCart(), and calculate totals

requirements.summary: Create a checkout flow that allows users to complete their purchase with order confirmation
acceptanceCriteria: Users can proceed from cart to checkout
Checkout captures necessary order information
Orders are stored in the backend
Users receive confirmation after completing purchase

file_operations.description: Create checkout page with order summary, form for customer information, and submit button that calls checkout() backend method to complete the purchase
Create order confirmation page that displays success message and order details after successful checkout

requirements.summary: Implement product categories or filtering to help users browse skincare items by type
acceptanceCriteria: Products are categorized by skincare type
Users can filter or navigate products by category
Category information is stored with each product

file_operations.description: Create category filter component with buttons or dropdown for skincare categories (cleansers, moisturizers, serums, masks) that triggers filtering via getProductsByCategory() backend method
Add CategoryFilter component to product catalog page and implement category filtering logic using getProductsByCategory() backend method when category is selected

requirements.summary: Design a clean, elegant storefront interface with a cohesive visual theme that reflects skincare and wellness aesthetics
acceptanceCriteria: The interface uses a consistent color scheme appropriate for skincare products
Typography is clean and readable
Layout provides good visual hierarchy and whitespace
Product images are prominently displayed
Overall aesthetic feels premium and wellness-focused

file_operations.description: Add custom CSS variables and global styles for skincare theme using soft, natural color palette (sage green, cream, terracotta tones) with focus on whitespace and readability
Extend Tailwind configuration with custom skincare color palette (sage green, cream, terracotta), typography settings for clean modern fonts, and spacing utilities for spacious layouts
Create layout component with header, navigation, and footer that establishes consistent visual structure and spacing across all pages

requirements.summary: Display generated product images and hero banner as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are loaded from the public assets directory
Images are properly displayed in the product catalog and hero section
Image paths reference the generated filenames

file_operations.description: Create hero banner component that displays the generated hero image from frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png with overlay text and call-to-action

Add HeroBanner component to the top of product catalog page and configure ProductCard components to use generated product images from frontend/public/assets/generated/ (cleanser-product.dim_400x400.png, moisturizer-product.dim_400x400.png, serum-product.dim_400x400.png, mask-product.dim_400x400.png) based on product data
Create utility functions to map product IDs or categories to their corresponding generated image filenames in frontend/public/assets/generated/ directory
